data.oracle_text: This creature can't block.
When this creature enters, search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
When this creature enters, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice three Forests.
This creature can't be blocked by more than one creature.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a green creature.
Search your library for a green creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
Search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
When this creature enters, you gain 4 life.
Flying, vigilance

Flying
When this creature dies, shuffle it into its owner's library.
Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
Destroy all lands.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
If an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for up to three Plains cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
Destroy target tapped creature.

phase_log: Draw Phase: Garruk skips draw (First Player rule). Hand size: 7.
Main Phase: Garruk plays Forest (1).
Main Phase: Garruk casts Jungle Lion {G}.
End Phase: Garruk passes.
Draw Phase: Elspeth draws Path of Peace. Hand size: 8.
Main Phase: Elspeth plays Plains (1).
End Phase: Elspeth passes.
Draw Phase: Garruk draws Forest.

Main Phase: Elspeth casts Gift of Estates {1}{W} (Garruk has 3 lands, Elspeth has 2).

Cleanup Phase: Elspeth discards 2 Plains to hand size 7.
Draw Phase: Garruk draws Forest.

Main Phase: Elspeth casts Border Guard {2}{W} (1/4).
Draw Phase: Garruk draws Monstrous Growth.
Main Phase: Garruk plays Forest (6).
Main Phase: Garruk casts Natural Order {2}{G}{G}. Sacrifices Wood Elves as cost.
Action: Searches library for Primeval Force. Puts onto battlefield.
Trigger: Primeval Force enters. Garruk sacrifices 3 Forests to keep it.
Combat Phase: Jungle Lion attacks. Elspeth blocks with Border Guard.
Damage: Lion deals 2 to Guard. Guard deals 1 to Lion. Jungle Lion dies.

Main Phase: Elspeth casts Wrath of God {2}{W}{W}.

Main Phase: Elspeth casts Vengeance {3}{W} targeting tapped Charging Rhino. Rhino destroyed.
